document_data.name: Altraloth
document_data.mainbody:
An '''altraloth''' was a [[yugoloth]] of any type (from lesser yugoloths such as [[mezzoloth]]s to greater yugoloths such as [[ultroloth]]s) that had been transformed into a unique being by a ritual known only to the [[night hag]]s.{{Cite dragon annual/1997/Pox of the Planes|104}}
{{TOC limit|3}}
document_data.Abilities: Altraloths were changed little mentally, but their physical forms often changed dramatically and they gained powers far in excess of the rest of their kind. After they had paid off their debt to the hags, they often rose to become the rulers of their kind.

Known and Rumored Altraloths.Anthraxus:
{{Main|Anthraxus}}
* [[Anthraxus]], an ultroloth transformed by the hags to rid themselves of an order of paladins.
Known and Rumored Altraloths.Bubonix: * [[Bubonix]], believed to have once been an [[arcanaloth]].{{Cite dragon annual/1997/Pox of the Planes|105}}
Known and Rumored Altraloths.Charon:
{{Main|Charon}}
* [[Charon]], also called Cerlic, once a [[marraenoloth]] and still resembled others of his kind.{{Cite dragon annual/1997/Pox of the Planes|107-108}}
Known and Rumored Altraloths.General of Gehenna: * The [[General of Gehenna]], either an altraloth or an unenhanced ultroloth.
Known and Rumored Altraloths.Taba: * [[Taba]]'s true form was unknown, because she was a master shapeshifter.{{Cite dragon annual/1997/Pox of the Planes|109}}
Known and Rumored Altraloths.Typhus: * [[Typhus (yugoloth)|Typhus]], once a mere [[mezzoloth]], but later resembled a 12-foot-high mezzoloth with a hunched back and a limp.{{Cite dragon annual/1997/Pox of the Planes|108}}
